## <span class="ez-toc-section" id="Scrape_Twitter"></span>Scrape Twitter<span class="ez-toc-section-end"></span>

Ever wonder how people scrape Twitter for certain Tweets? Ever wonder how to make a Word Cloud?

[My tutorial][1] on [SkillShare][2] will teach you how to use the programming language R and RStudio to <a class="thirstylink" title="Scrape Twitter SkillShare" href="http://markgingrass.com/recommends/scrape-twitter-skillshare/" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">scrape Twitter</a> in minutes and then generate a Word Cloud with the results. All the code is included with the course.

## <span class="ez-toc-section" id="Software"></span>Software<span class="ez-toc-section-end"></span>

Everything you need is free to download for both Mac and PC users.

## <span class="ez-toc-section" id="Prerequisites"></span>Prerequisites<span class="ez-toc-section-end"></span>

No programming experience necessary to duplicate what is in the video; however, it will be much more beneficial if you have some programming experience. With some experience, you can manipulate the code to better suit your needs.
